```{r}
#4.Facenting

Filtered_price <- Diamond_data %>%
  filter(cut == "Good" | cut == "Ideal" | cut == "Premium", price >= 1000) 

Diamond_data %>%
  filter(cut %in% c("Good","Ideal","Premium"), price >= 1000)

ggplot(Filtered_price, aes(x=cut, y=depth )) +
         geom_bar(stat = "identity")

ggplot(Filtered_price, aes(x=cut, y=depth, color=clarity)) +
         geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
         facet_wrap(~clarity)

ggplot(Filtered_price, aes(x=cut, y=depth)) +
         geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "purple", colour = "green") +
         facet_wrap(~clarity)


```
```{r}

Median_dimension_diamond <- Diamond_data %>%
  group_by(cut)%>%
  summarize(mediaX=sum(x), mediaY=sum(y), mediaZ=sum(z))


Cut_premium <- Diamond_data %>%
  filter(cut=="Premium")%>%
  group_by(clarity)%>%
  summarize(minPrice=min(price), maxPrice = max(price))
  
  
ggplot(Cut_premium, aes(x=clarity, y=maxPrice, fill=clarity))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")
  
  
```
